authn.notes: Strong reliability and test coverage; a few incident learnings pending follow-up.

authz.notes: Stable. Improve incident response automation and add more system tests.

account-management.notes: Track recurring incident type and complete remaining production readiness checks.

activate-device-direct.notes: Recent deploy instability; prioritize system tests and hardening from gameday findings.

activate-inventory.notes: Good trend; address top flaky tests and add outage drills.

ugm.notes: Needs more production readiness automation and incident playbooks.

pingfed.notes: Outage record is strong; improve solution/system test automation coverage.

session-manager.notes: Moderate risk; close readiness gaps and tighten incident response SLAs.

sso-manager.notes: Healthy baseline; improve gameday scenarios and system test depth.

frontend.notes: UI regressions observed; add more E2E/system tests and incident runbooks.

ui-doorway.notes: Improve readiness checks and gameday remediation tracking.

mfe.notes: Focus on system tests and production readiness score improvements.

notification-service.notes: New service ramping up; needs gameday participation and broader test coverage.

audit-service.notes: Solid reliability; improve incident response playbooks.

config-service.notes: Early stage; prioritize production readiness checklist and system tests.
